extension.description: Скрипт для помощи работы Yatse в Kodi
extension.news: 1.4.2: Picture playlist support seems broken on Kodi 17. 1.4.1: Improve picture support. 1.4.0: Add support for pushing meta data when streaming from Yatse. (Except for videos containing ? on Kodi 18 due to a Kodi bug). 1.3.0: Add a patch for YoutubeDL issue on Windows Kodi + add support for plot as meta data. 1.2.3: Youtube Add-On is mandatory to resolve youtube urls. 1.2.2: Fix issue with busy dialog on Kodi 16 or less. 1.2.1: YoutubeDL is no more optional and used first to gather metadata and provide better integration with Yatse 8.2.5. 1.1.0: Fix some magnet not working + add support for YATP torrent plugin. 1.0.9: Fix possible issue with YoutubeDL and errors + Always fallback to try to play the url in case it's actually playable. 1.0.8: Add German translation. 1.0.7: Add support for Youtube-dl module as a secondary url resolver.
